info.title: Emerge API
info.description: Privacy-first API for accessing consented user data. Emerge provides two main services: **Link** for collecting user consent and **Query** for retrieving user data.

get.description: Returns search history data immediately using the api_search mart view.

parameters.name: ingested_end

schema.description: Filter by ingestion timestamp (end), defaults to now()
schema.title: Ingested End

parameters.description: Filter by ingestion timestamp (end), defaults to now()

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of rows to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of rows to return
